amendment.description: To prohibit H-2C nonimmigrants from adjusting to lawful permanent resident status.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3969 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 35. Record Vote Number: 135.
Amendment SA 3969 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S4776-4786; text: CR S4776) To prohibit H-2C nonimmigrants from adjusting to lawful permanent resident status.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3969 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Kyl.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3969 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 35. Record Vote Number: 135.
